channel.title: .torrent as possible download
channel.description:
Hello. Will there be torrent version for download? Many people and me have fast connections (over 200Mbps) and we are not able to take full advantage of download sites. I would like you to release torrent version.
What do you think about it?

item.title: .torrent as possible download
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Please see the Launch Details sticky in the News section.

Thanks.
